title: Knock
content:
Knock Level 2 Transmutation Spell Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock. 18m Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Transmutation Spell

Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.

Knock is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Knock is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Knock Information

Description: Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: No

How to Acquire Knock

Knock can be acquired by the following classes: Bard College of Lore (Bard Subclass) College of Valour (Bard Subclass) Sorcerer Wizard Abjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Necromancy School (Wizard Subclass) Conjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Enchantment School (Wizard Subclass) Divination School (Wizard Subclass) Illusion School (Wizard Subclass) Transmutation School (Wizard Subclass) Knock can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard College of Lore (Bard Subclass) College of Valour (Bard Subclass) Sorcerer Wizard Abjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Necromancy School (Wizard Subclass) Conjuration School (Wizard Subclass) Enchantment School (Wizard Subclass) Divination School (Wizard Subclass) Illusion School (Wizard Subclass) Transmutation School (Wizard Subclass)
